gibbyjohn wrote:
> 
> 
> Is it possible to compare error messages that a program prints out to
> what I know the error message should be, for a given input, in a
> junit test?  That is, sort of intercept the output from
> System.out.println and look at it.

Well, out is a public variable on the class System, so you could just do 
this:

PrintStream standardOut = System.out;
System.out = yourOutputStream;

When the test has finished, do

System.out = standardOut;

I know there's a setOut() method, but that's just false encapsulation.
--
